verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] posting his highest approval ratings in 11 months , according to a recent poll .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: posting] [ARG1: his highest approval ratings in 11 months] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a recent poll] .
President Donald Trump is posting his highest approval ratings in 11 months , [V: according] to a recent poll .
